CustomField.formula:
IF( BEGINS( OwnerId ,'005') && Branch_Code__c != '0000' && Branch_Code__c != '00229', Owner:User.SCC_Area__c,
IF( BEGINS( OwnerId ,'005') && (Branch_Code__c == '0000' || Branch_Code__c == '00229') && Cost_Center__c != '', 'KP00',
IF( Branch_Code__c != '00229', '',
IF( Cost_Center__c != '', 'KP00',
'KP00') ) ))
CustomField.label: Area
